name: 陳偉堯
objective: 課程內容包括：(1)教導學生替代的作業系統和開發環境(如Linux)，(2)複習基礎程式概念，(3)提昇學生撰寫程式能力，(4)強調物件導向，(5)教導學生分工撰寫程式解決研究相關問題，(6)運用程式處理大量數值資料等，實際授課內容將由授課教師視情況及學生反應彈性調整。
schedule:
Week 1: concept of computing
Week 2: basic Linux/Windows commands
Week 3: IDE/virtual machine installation/Linux installation
Week 4: Streams, pipes, and redirects
Week 4: basic C++ review
Week 5: while loop and for loop
Week 6: terminal and vi/package management
Week 7: file operation and process control
Week 8: project assignment #1
Week 9: midterm
Week 10: relational expressions and bisection method
Week 11: arrays, strings, unions, enumerations, pointers
Week 12: prime numbers/factoring a number
Week 13: functions/random number generation
Week 14: Objects and classes
Week 15: project assignment #2
Week 16: random Walk
Week 17: Class Inheritance
Week 18: final
scorePolicy: 平時出席及作業成績40%，期中考或簡報30%，期末考或簡報30%
materials: Prata, S. (2005). C++ Primer Plus, Fifth edition, SAMS, 1202 pages
